EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status NO_FUEL with warning “out of fuel” and furnace_source containing 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status NO_INGREDIENTS with 2 units of coal and furnace_result holding 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs, research set to automation, status NO_POWER, and electrical_id updated to 9792.
- ElectricityGroup with id=9792 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage=0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); status NOT_CONNECTED with warnings “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid” and “no fluid present in connections”.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) now holding ~200 units of water at 15°; status NO_FUEL (out of fuel), with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), steam output at (-7.5, 24.5), and fluid_system updated to [36228].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) working properly; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5) with fluid_box holding 100 units of water at 15° and fluid_system updated to [36228].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=36228 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=36229 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=36230 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=36235 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=36234 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=36239 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=36238 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=36241 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Fluid System Identifier Mismatch:
  • Connection attempts used a series of inconsistent fluid_system IDs (35884, 35927, 35970, 36013, 36056, 36099, 36142, 36185) that do not match the current working identifier (36228) of the boiler and offshore pump. Always retrieve and apply the active fluid_system ID from the latest working entities.

- Rigid Pipeline Stabilization Approach:
  • Relying on a fixed 10-second waiting period for pipeline stabilization leads to unreliable connectivity. Implement dynamic checks to verify that pipelines are properly connected before retrying.

- Persistent Steam Engine Disconnection:
  • Despite multiple reattempts with varying fluid_system IDs, the steam engine remains unconnected. Verify that its connection points align correctly with the operative fluid system to achieve successful linkage.
